data.actual_result: Preview does not match and is misleading
data.expected_result: Image preview should match the result after upload.
data.short_description: Discord Avatar upload preview incorrectly scales GIFs rather than cropping them
data.steps_to_repro: - Open User Settings - Click to upload a new avatar - Select a GIF that has a longer width than height or vice versa ( Test Images: http://i.imgur.com/b6Gf3rK.gif / http://i.imgur.com/F44L9Nv.gif )  - Upload said GIF and it will correctly display, despite the preview image.
